bug.short_desc: Javascrip messages not shown in the nice new screen

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 Build Identifier: Firefox 4.0
Browse to a page on a website contaning a from with a javascrip check Dont fill in al the requierd fields Click on submit (Ok, Send, Yes....) The Javascript is shown and tells the user that not all requierd fields are filled in. This is done in the new GUI of Firefox 4.0 Now close the message an click on a different menu link on the website Click on back (return to the form) Again click on submit (Ok, Send, Yes....) You will see that the Javascrip message is shown in the old style.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: Browse to a page on a website contaning a from with a javascrip check Dont fill in al the requierd fields Click on submit (Ok, Send, Yes....) The Javascript is shown and tells the user that not all requierd fields are filled in. This is done in the new GUI of Firefox 4.0 Now close the message an click on a different menu link on the website Click on back (return to the form) Again click on submit (Ok, Send, Yes....) You will see that the Javascrip message is shown in the old style. Actual Results: The old javascript messaging gui is shown
Expected Results: The new javascript messaging gui of firefox 4.0 should be shown

Build: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110406 Firefox/4.2a1pre
